format: JavaScript (React testing with Jest and Testing Library)
description: This file contains a test suite for the React component 'App'. It uses '@testing-library/react' to render the component and verify that the header text 'Breezy' is present in the document, serving as a basic smoke test.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case that renders the 'App' component and checks for the presence of the header text 'Breezy'.
